How we can help you with your business

Here are the services we provide for business

Open your company

Open a remote company using Stripe Atlas from any place, worldwide and in a startup environment

We give you a north

We will handle about everything you need to apply for Atlas to open an US company from everywhere

We build your platform

Using our community of contributors we will create what you need to turn your idea into a product

We solve your bugs

Whatever issue you have with your project, we have a community to solve by demand, and pay as you go

Be independent

You can have your project remote and our professionals are location independent and we use tools and processes to sync projects and deliveries using agile methodologies

Worldwide payment

We know a lot about payment worldwide, and we can setup a worldwide marketplace and provide you a easy way to pay for project demands and receive money

The future of work

We make part of the new way of work, more descentralized and based on collaboration, in the way that it can sustain and scale remotely

Multilanguage

We provide multilanguage platforms using the best tools and a community of translators

How can we help you in your career

Here is our value to help freelancers

Work for global companies remote or in office worldwide

Work with different clients on demmand, and get a chance to be hired and work abroad

We give you a north

We mentor our users to get the best of their talent, and we collaborate with each other in a good work environment

Build platforms

You will be part of our community of contributors we will create what you need help ideas to turn into solutions, using open source and collaborative tools

Solve on demand bugs

Whatever issue our clients have with their projects, you will be part of a community who will help to solve it, and you will be paid by your contributions

Be independent

You can work remotely and you will be in a community of professionals location independent and we use tools and processes to sync projects and deliveries using agile methodologies

Worldwide payment

We know a lot about payment worldwide, and we can setup a worldwide marketplace and provide you a easy way to be paid for your work

The future of work
